subject: Football (College)
Football
Colleges and Universities
Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Joe Paterno did much to forward Penn State’s academic and athletic reputation. In the end, as he dealt with a scandal, he wished he had done more.
snippet: Joe Paterno did much to forward Penn State’s academic and athletic reputation. In the end, as he dealt with a scandal, he wished he had done more.
